titles.title: Let's go up to the mount,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let's go up to the mount,
Up to the mount of the Lord.
Let's go up to the mount,
Up to the mount of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let's bring an offering of praise...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Help me climb each step of the way...
